sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:m="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <RegisterIntegrationAgent xmlns="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema"> <!-- nillable--> <user xsi:type="xsd:string">String</user> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">String</password> <!-- nillable--> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">String</company> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <!-- nillable--> <url xsi:type="xsd:string">String</url> <!-- nillable--> <agentStatus xsi:type="xsd:string">String</agentStatus> <!-- nillable--> <heartbeatInterval xsi:type="xsd:string">String</heartbeatInterval> <!-- nillable--> <agentPassword xsi:type="xsd:string">String</agentPassword> <allowsDirectESR xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</allowsDirectESR> <!-- nillable--> <services xsi:type="m:SoapIntegrationService"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <domain xsi:type="m:SoapIntegrationDomain"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <!-- nillable--> <serviceList xsi:type="m:SoapServiceList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <service xsi:type="m:SoapService"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <!-- nillable--> <status xsi:type="xsd:string">String</status> <!-- nillable--> <url xsi:type="xsd:string">String</url> </service> </serviceList> </domain> </services> </RegisterIntegrationAgent> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
